Description.Text: Arona Hotel Atrium is a modern 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation in Ruesselsheim, southwest of Frankfurt. Highlights include a sauna, free Wi-Fi, good public transport links and a good location near the Adam Opel Factory. Ruesselsheim is a large town boasting good road links into Frankfurt, Mainz and the spa town Wiesbaden. It has a long history of supporting the automobile industry and is notably the home of Adam Opel AG. Nearby places of interest include the Adam Opel Factory, Ruesselsheim Theatre and Ruesselsheim Museum. Ruesselsheim S-Bahn station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular regional destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise building. Facilities include a sauna. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are simply decorated in warm tones with carpeted floors. Amenities include satellite TV, a small sitting area, work desk, mini-bar, radio and an en-suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy complimentary tea and coffee in the lobby 24-hours a day. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
